website_summaries.verdict: Designed for pilots in 1937, these are possibly the most iconic sunglasses in the world.
pros: We love how these sunglasses give great visual clarity
Comes in a variety of colors, including the classic mirrored version
cons: As with all these sunglasses, some customers felt they had received poor quality counterfeits
Look for ‘RB’ etched on one lens on all Ray-Bans

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy from this seller
customer_reviews.text: Not received the glasses even after a month and seller doesn't respond to emails
customer_reviews.author: Fathimafarwin

customer_reviews.title: Sold by and shipped by Amazon are the REAL DEAL
customer_reviews.text: These are definitely the real deal! I paid close attention to other reviewers and made certain I purchased "sold by Amazon and shipped by Amazon". I have not had a pair of Aviators since my late 80's high school days. I was just tired of wearing cheap sunglasses and went back to the classic--except that now there are a lot more choices of lens and frame combinations that actually make Aviators unique AND high quality. They fit like a glove and feel like an old pair of jeans. Perfect. The difference in quality of sight through these as compared to my cheapies is amazing. Purchase from Amazon and you will not be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Meredith

customer_reviews.title: For my opinion this may be a Fake sunglasses
customer_reviews.text: Glasses are not crystal clear as it is compared with 14 dollars sunglasses from some company on Amazon website The engraved letters are missing on the top of the frame as described in the picture (In the pictured the engraved letters ''Made in Italy'' are showed on 2 different places. One on the small bar between on 2 glasses and One on the right of the frame) Those Engraved letters on frame also are so awful The frame is heavy made sunglasses cheap and uncomfortable
customer_reviews.author: VP

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Purple
customer_reviews.text: I got the brushed bronze with purple mirror lenses. I am used to wearing plastic black frame glasses. I have several designer pairs of Louis Vuitton, Chanel, and MK. These are different than what I am used to. I'm not sure if they look to big on me. They are pretty but a little wide , and they fall down my nose. Not sure if I'm keeping them but they are nice
customer_reviews.author: CatrineTop Contributor: Baking

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely terrible! The glasses arrived and I was thrilled
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely terrible! The glasses arrived and I was thrilled, however, a short few months later the "Ray Ban" logo on the front of the glasses began to scratch off after minimal use. To my surprise, I contacted the seller and NEVER HEARD BACK. I am shocked that I heard nothing following spending money on a pair of glasses that were advertised as "real".... Clearly the quality of these glasses was nothing near expected. I am still waiting to hear back from the seller as Id like to have a little faith in people, but I'm starting to doubt this sellers professionalism.
customer_reviews.author: kelly

customer_reviews.title: Mixed feelings
customer_reviews.text: These are legit Ray Bans. They are blue. They are O.K. I don't get the fuss. They don't block a ton of light, and they are not the best fitting either. You're buying a name mostly. I have had many dollar-store knock-offs that looked and performed the same.
customer_reviews.author: A A Ron

customer_reviews.title: I ordered this to replace another pair from a different ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this to replace another pair from a different seller (I accidentally damaged the first pair). All the specs are the same except matte gold vs not matte. These were NOT the same glasses. They were not blue and were too large and heavy for my face. I cannot see any other difference in the specs. The other pair I had received from the other seller was blue and fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: SG

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY - PIECE OF CRAP~
customer_reviews.text: I would give these fake glasses a 0 star if I could. I read the reviews and should have heeded their warnings. I wore these only 1 day at the beach. It was not a rough day but these piece of CRAP glasses was scratched after 30 minutes and they became bent with barely any wear and tear. So I paid $180 to wear these glasses 1 day!! DO NOT BUY THESE!
customer_reviews.author: Marci

customer_reviews.title: Overall - amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely amazing. The only bad thing is that they weren’t polarized and unfortunately they dont have polarized right now. I am waiting for the polarized version to come here on amazon and will gladly purchase it.
customer_reviews.author: Kay

customer_reviews.title: I loved these glasses
customer_reviews.text: I loved these glasses! I had them just short of a month and was in a bad MVA in the line of duty. My totaled car was taken to a holding yard and unfortunately, the glasses were stolen, they left me the case though 😡 I plan on ordering another pair in the near future. So upset that someone would do that. Hopefully, they needed them more than I did.
customer_reviews.author: debra

customer_reviews.title: Turrible.
customer_reviews.text: These ray ban glasses looked like they had been worn for many years and dropped about a hundred times. I was under the impression I was buying new glasses. These came with the case and just the glasses. No tags or anything. I returned them and bought a pair at sunglass hut. Also, I would like to add, I spent $153 on these. $153 came out of my bank account to pay for these. I returned them and got a $153 amazon gift card. Neat. Can I pay a utility bill with that? The owner is a damn trillionaire and I can’t get real US tender for a return. Awesome👍🏻
customer_reviews.author: James DeVelder

customer_reviews.title: Feel like a million buck$
customer_reviews.text: I bought the Gold/Gold mirror variety because I like them a little flashy. I would recommend them to anyone and everyone notices/likes them. They fit well also, not overly big.
customer_reviews.author: HealthyMexican

customer_reviews.title: The quality is very good and the size of the glasses are a good ...
customer_reviews.text: My order was Amazon and these glasses are made in Italy. Someone typed that the knockoffs are made somewhere else. The quality is very good and the size of the glasses are a good fit for my face and head size. If I have one complaint, it's that the glasses seem to sit a little low on my face. I feel like the wire across the top is almost in my line of sight. I adjusted the nose pieces downward and it helped. Overall, I am very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: David L. Dick

customer_reviews.title: Fragile & Flimsy
customer_reviews.text: I loved the look of these glasses, but the quality is seriously lacking. Generally, I'm willing to splurge on sunglasses because I take care of them and keep them for years. These were so fragile, I had to be careful pulling them out of my hair and off my head because the frames were so flimsy they would bend! I had these glasses for less than two months when one day they slipped out of my fingers on to a thick rug and shattered into a million pieces. If your looking for a comparable pair, try Triple Crown Full Mirror Color Reflective Lens. The quality is much better and the price is great!
customer_reviews.author: Anne C.

customer_reviews.title: looks great, has a nice weight
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as a gift for my wife for christmas (which i havent given as yet) but i did open them to scrutinize the product. They seem original to me: looks great, has a nice weight, ray-ban is etched on the right lens and RB on the left, made in italy, came with case and booklet of "ray-ban icons". Product was what i ordered and arrived on time. Totally satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Metalhead

customer_reviews.title: Delivered on time
customer_reviews.text: Fast response from the customer service department. Shipped on time. The glasses are exactly the same as the ones I purchased directly from Ray Ban. Not cheap knockoffs as others described. They do say men’s but they’re definitely woman’s.
customer_reviews.author: STACEY

customer_reviews.title: I loved these so much that my other half got me ...
customer_reviews.text: I loved these so much that my other half got me a second pair... after I crushed these a month after having them! I ordered mine from Sunglasses Hut on here, and that's also where he ended up ordering my surprise replacements from! We've have a good experience with them both times. These fit so incredibly well, and they're very comfortable for all day wear. I also feel that they look great on any face! There have been times where we're driving somewhere together, and he has forgotten his sunglasses, so I'll give him mine, and they look just as good on him.
customer_reviews.author: Tiff Rides

customer_reviews.title: Head Turners!
customer_reviews.text: I fell in love with these glasses the minute I saw them. I get a ton of compliments from people as well. Well worth the buy. I received these glasses promptly, in great shape without any issues. They are so comfortable to wear, although they are more delicate then other glasses I have worn possible because I have never bought a decent pair of glasses in the past. Love, love them!
customer_reviews.author: Dawn and James

customer_reviews.title: Bright color
customer_reviews.text: Love the color. These are the smaller sizes from two options. They keep sliding off my face but I'll see if I can adjust that.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Looks cool and protects your eyes from the sun
customer_reviews.text: These sunglasses fit great and look super, especially in the bright sunlight. The lenses are VERY green. I expected a more teal hue of the lenses but this is more like. Teal does shine through on occasion around the rim of the lense. They match pretty much everything. They are polarized and worked really well on my latest long road trip driving through the desert. I am so satisfied with these aviators that I will be getting them in another color as well.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Love them!!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit, light weight, came with case for them, correct color and definitely stylish. Will be purchasing again.
customer_reviews.author: Hayley Rawahneh

customer_reviews.title: I liked but not sure if is original the plastic
customer_reviews.text: I liked but not sure if is original the plastic. Don't have RB logo on it, and have some sharp edges and today just fall from a short height and broke in pieces like ship glass
customer_reviews.author: Mturk28

customer_reviews.title: Summary: I have never personally bought Ray-Bans before, ...
customer_reviews.text: Summary: I have never personally bought Ray-Bans before, but I can say with utmost confidence that my purchase hasn't gone down the drain. To those who are on the fence, they are double mirrored and reduce glare by a long shot. Pros: -Solid build quality, all metal -Glass for lenses -Comfortable fit, not to heavy on any side Cons: -Wish there was more "protection" at the eyebrow level (but it's minor when driving)
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Otfinoski

customer_reviews.title: Buy somewhere else!
customer_reviews.text: No ⭐ review! Questioning the authenticity of this ray ban. It came with no box and all, just the case and the sunglasses, wrapped in a plastic bag. Buyer beware! Will be returning asap!
customer_reviews.author: Brahman1888

customer_reviews.title: Be careful lots of fakes being sold on amazon.
customer_reviews.text: These were fake fake fake. Be careful they can say made in Italy and still be fakes. I would suggest going to a sunglasses hut at your local mall and do a comparison before keeping. Ive received 3 fakes through amazon wardrobe so far. Only one has been real but they were too big
customer_reviews.author: P Myers

customer_reviews.title: Lens was popped out on arrival
customer_reviews.text: Just got the Raybands today and one of the lens were popped out, i had to pop it back in resulting in scratches on frame and the glass itself. The package itself has no signs of damage of any kind so im guessing it had to happen prior. Not super happy about spending $170 and it not being in good condition.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: the real deal holy field
customer_reviews.text: i was worried because they were not sold by amazon just shipped by amazon. But they turned out to be legit. Thsi is the 3rd pair of 3025's i have purchased and so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: MIke

customer_reviews.title: These are fake (close looking though) and uncomfortable vs. ...
customer_reviews.text: These are fake (close looking though) and uncomfortable vs. the real deal. A solid fake, but fake nonetheless. Stay away.
customer_reviews.author: junaluna

customer_reviews.title: Very nice and pretty in pink
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing and I love them. The quality seems very good. I got the pink ones and I love love love them.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: The caption says Large or oversized so I purchased the ...
customer_reviews.text: The caption says Large or oversized so I purchased the Raybans. When they arrived they were such small lenses I immediately sent them back even know add says OVERSIZED...NOT!
customer_reviews.author: Htowngal

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Like it very much :) Ordered them for.my daughter. They are great!!
customer_reviews.author: lisalisa

customer_reviews.title: Look great!
customer_reviews.text: If you put them on in front of a mirror, you immediately say aloud, “everyone come see how good look”! 😎
customer_reviews.author: NWAWoolley

customer_reviews.title: Love Love Love Ray Ban Sunglasses
customer_reviews.text: Ray Ban are my 1st choice for sunglasses. I have all colors and these are nice (orange mirror) BUT I was hoping for the ones Ciara wore in her video "Dance Like We're Making Love". I read lots of reviews about Ray Ban sunglasses being FAKE on Amazon. Surely Amazon is not selling fake items, but the prices sure are great compared to making a purchase at a Ray Ban store ( $129.00 and UP)..
customer_reviews.author: TimelessStyle

customer_reviews.title: Perfect! As advertised and Authentic!!
customer_reviews.text: I was wanting the 62mm silver frame w/ silver mirror lens and could not find these ANYWHERE!! The USA RayBan site didn't even offer these. These are legit. The are made in Italy. They have all the markings (mini RB labels where they are supposed to be) identifying these glasses as original and they are not fake knock-offs. These did not disappoint. If you are looking for 62mm silver frame/silver mirror Ray Bans then this is it!! Picture doesn't do them justice. Very pleased with them.
customer_reviews.author: DrumTech_35

customer_reviews.title: Nice glasses
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend loves the color purple so I took a chance and bought these Ray Bans for his birthday. Great news was that he loved the glasses! Bad news was that I found all these Ray Bans (RB3025) that are posted on Amazon for $70+ for $19.99 on a different website! Next time I'll scout around a bit more on the web before making an impulse purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa Fee

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY! THESE ARE FAKE
customer_reviews.text: i PURCHASED TO REPLACE MY EXISTING "REAL" RAYBANS. THESE WERE NOT THE COLOR I CHOSE BUT THEN THEY WERE ALSO MUCH LIGHTER THAN MY CURRENT ONES AND LOOKING FURTHER THEY ARE CHEAP, MADE IN CHINA, FRAMES AND THERE'S NO INDICATION WHATSOEVER THAT THEY ARE RAYBANS!
customer_reviews.author: Trina

customer_reviews.title: Great product at great price!
customer_reviews.text: I really like the look of the color mirrored ray-bans, but with polarization they look quite a bit darker than in the photo. Of the four pairs I own (2 mirror-only & 1 polarized non-mirrored) these offer by far the most protection and the effect is spectacular. Great for driving or just laying out and relaxing.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew A. Garlough

customer_reviews.title: ray-bans
customer_reviews.text: These are a great addition to my collection of glasses. I love the lightness of the lens and they go well with my fair skin tone and red hair.
customer_reviews.author: Leo Cosmo

customer_reviews.title: Frame was too small
customer_reviews.text: I ended up having to send these back as the 53 frame was too small. The 58 was not available on Amazon so I had to go to another source the get them.
customer_reviews.author: Patty V

customer_reviews.title: I am very pleased with my purchuse and got many compliments on them
customer_reviews.text: The glasses came a week late so I was a little worried because I wanted them for a cruise I went on. But they came in just in time! When I opened them I was impressed with how authentic they look. The reason why I bought them was because I bought the same pair in Italy and lost them. I am very pleased with my purchuse and got many compliments on them.
customer_reviews.author: Bec

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful sunglassess!
customer_reviews.text: Long ago, many years I've been using this brand and I will continue using sunglassess for eternity. I have now bought these, then continue at eyewear and I am thinking of some special to take the extra mile to either cases or to protect from heat and infrared rays and if the other case, they should see to where I turn my eyes and protect from UV rays (ie, the same use I give here on earth, when you go to the beach with my wife).
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel-uy

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t block as much sun as I thought they would but look so stylish
customer_reviews.text: Very stylish and lightweight. Coverage feels good but even though they are dark blue they don’t block as much of the FL sun as I’d like. Great overall comfort. Nose pads feel good and don’t slip on face or collect foundation.
customer_reviews.author: Cee Sully

customer_reviews.title: ... to a dealer and saw they are just as nice, my bad on my wanting to return them
customer_reviews.text: I first thought these Ray Bans were close to a knock off until I went to a dealer and saw they are just as nice, my bad on my wanting to return them. I adjusted the temples and nose pads, they fit fine now. But I will say one thing, I ordered the light green frost (mirrored) lenses, but what I received the blue (mirrored). Just as happy.
customer_reviews.author: Zann

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gold aviator lenses
customer_reviews.text: These sunglasses were exactly as I’d hoped. I wanted a pair of mirrored gold aviators, and these are perfect. An added bonus is that, even though they are not polarized lenses, the glasses are very similar to my polarized sunglasses. Highly recommend for anyone who wants gold sunglasses and who prefers a polarized lens.
customer_reviews.author: Jane

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!! 100% authentic
customer_reviews.text: Perfect!! 100% authentic, and what a great buy!!! I have a small face, and this was perfect! Very comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: Caf211

customer_reviews.title: love em!
customer_reviews.text: These ray bans are awesome. Great classic look that can make any geek look cool! The lenses are very soothing on the eyes and with a little tweeking of the frames the fit is great. The reason I don't give em5 stars is because of the design your going to get some side glare. If your looking for perfect vision you need more of a wrap style frame. Oh and the lenses are very scratch resistant. Would I buy them again? Yes! I'm on my second pair. Also I think under $100 for a pair is a great price!
customer_reviews.author: shasta

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: I normally wouldn’t spend a lot of money on sunglasses, but these were well worth the money, nice fit, comfortable and good lens size. They are mirrored which I wasnt sure I’d like, but they are awesome. I’m always getting compliments on the color too. Love em!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Great glasses
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these! I wear them every day when I drive to and from class. Pros: 1) They look great 2) They are very comfortable 3) They really do protect your eyes. I drive about 45 minutes with the sun right in my eyes every single day and I never strain or have any issues. Cons: 1) They are a little expensive but I'm not complaining they are wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: Joeyd

customer_reviews.title: Bad sunglasses
customer_reviews.text: The sunglasses came in a damaged box and quality bad. Arm on sunglasses is loose!!
customer_reviews.author: terry kelly

customer_reviews.title: Lens cracked after 2 months i do not reccomend
customer_reviews.text: Lens cracked after 2 months of use with a simple drop to the floor. now crack is larger and goes across eye line. I thought ray ban had a good two year warranty but that is apparently bullshit. I tried to use the warranty and get a replacement but they said I had to pay $75 to get them fixed. I did not pay close to $175 to have to pay for another $75 to fix them a couple of months later. this makes me want to never ever buy another pair of raybans
customer_reviews.author: Jay F.

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy! Will purchase from seller again! :)
customer_reviews.text: I love my new pair of sunglasses! These are deffinitly genuine Ray-Ban glasses. I have quite a few that were purchased from sun glass hut, compared them and the detail is identical. The model number is also printed on the bottom part of the upper bridge section of the frame which is a "fake" giveaway. Hope this helps.
customer_reviews.author: Angel

customer_reviews.title: Either real or very VERY well replicated!
customer_reviews.text: Naturally I was skeptical when reading the views where either someone loved them or someone hated them and said they were fake, but I ordered them anyways. I'm happy I did! They look as expected, with RB labels on all parts, came with a Ray Bans case and fit perfect! I got the green lenses at 58 mm after searching on youtube for what fit to get, and I love them. The only thing that makes me think their replicated is the awesome price... They're fragile, of course, because they're aviators and very delicate so just be careful if you end up buying them. Super pleased! Almost feel like it's too good to be true!
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Melley

customer_reviews.title: Extremely impressed
customer_reviews.text: These are a great pair of glasses if your looking for a pair of mirrored aviators. Yes, they are expensive but Ray-Ban is a great brand and you get excellent quality. I was tired of buying cheap aviators that scratched or broke easily, so I decided to invest in a quality pair. I ordered the 58mm sized and they fit perfectly. The vision is clearer then the cheap aviators I previously purchased. I've used them for a few weeks now with no issues. I'm not looking to text their scratch resistance but they have fallen a few times with no damage. Highly recommended if you wanted a solid pair of sunglasses for the summer.
customer_reviews.author: Matt S.

customer_reviews.title: pink didn't really match the default image but they are sharp and nice
customer_reviews.text: Ok glasses, pink didn't really match the default image but they are sharp and nice
customer_reviews.author: Muzza

customer_reviews.title: BAD OUT OF THE BOX!  Came out of the box BENT and twisted.
customer_reviews.text: If you pay over $150 for a pair of 'ICONS' they better be PERFECT! You can do better Ray Ban. I have loved the aviators in the past, but it was finally time to order more. I will give these another chance, but the next pair better not be as disappointing as this pair.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: I am so disappointed it like a navy blue
customer_reviews.text: This is not the color I received.I am so disappointed it like a navy blue. I bought to wear it with a sandals and its totally off
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: GOOD QUALITY, OVERSIZED and EDGY
customer_reviews.text: I own an array of Ray Ban Avaitors, but this pair are my absolute favorite! I’ve searched for something a little unique and bold for quite awhile. These sunglasses are good quality, oversized and edgy. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Customer Review

customer_reviews.title: Yeah...
customer_reviews.text: They arent the MIRROR AVIATORS.... get those from the Website... these DO HAVE MIRROR reflectives but they AREN'T mirror... idk if you get me... its still awesome but you can see my eyes a bit... those type yeah
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as a birthday gift for my daughter as she had seen some at the mall that sounded just like these. To my amazement she LOVES them, and feels like a Rock Star when she wears them. Since they needed a little adjustment to fit her, I sent her to my eye doc for tweeking the size of the frame.
customer_reviews.author: Beverly

customer_reviews.title: love love love!
customer_reviews.text: I am so obsessed with this color. I used to have the blue-green lenses in the matt gold frame and somehow lost them after about a year. I was so bummed. After about a year without them I decided to buy another pair and went for this color. Although I LOVED the last color I had, I love these even more! So pretty <3
customer_reviews.author: brewsters

customer_reviews.title: It's weight is not like a knock off brand and fits perfectly
customer_reviews.text: The sunglasses is exactly what I expected. The look is original and doesn't feel cheap. It's weight is not like a knock off brand and fits perfectly. I considered buying the 60mm frame but it would have been to big. The 58mm is excellent. For most people I think the 58mm would be great.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Rampersadsingh

customer_reviews.title: Good price for Ray Ban quality; reliable ever-trendy style
customer_reviews.text: These arrived on time and well packed. For anyone wondering, these are originals and come with everything described in the product description. Colors are pretty accurate to what is shown on the detail page as well. Can't really go wrong with Ray Bans and for the price, these were a good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: DigiSym

customer_reviews.title: Got this pairs for our son to wear during our ...
customer_reviews.text: Got this pairs for our son to wear during our European trip and he received many compliments in both Europe and from his friends here in the States.
customer_reviews.author: Legalspiff

customer_reviews.title: I could not be happier with the price and the sunglasses
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant to purchase because of some negative reviews i saw, but I went ahead and ordered them anyway. The item was exactly as described and they were authentic. I could not be happier with the price and the sunglasses. I saw that some people said they had received fake Ray-Bans, but I can at least say the ones I received were real.
customer_reviews.author: EW

customer_reviews.title: amazing deal! I am also very satisfied with the ...
customer_reviews.text: Authentic Ray-Bans for less than normal retail price, amazing deal! I am also very satisfied with the quick arrival :)
customer_reviews.author: Madison vanHaastrecht

customer_reviews.title: Nose pad broke
customer_reviews.text: This sunglasses were so fragile!! The nose pad broke in just 4 days!! We try to fixed and didn’t worked
customer_reviews.author: Ignacio Castro

customer_reviews.title: Sexiness
customer_reviews.text: I'm just a fan of the design raybands love these shades
customer_reviews.author: Roger Strachan Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Great sunnies!
customer_reviews.text: These are the perfect size and fit for a woman's face- the 58mm were just a little too large. I love these glasses and for the price, I love them even more! They are super lightweight and I just can't get enough of them! Definitely would purchase again or recommend buying them compared to at Sunglass Hut or Rayban directly.
customer_reviews.author: KC

customer_reviews.title: They were more green than blue... God ...
customer_reviews.text: They were more green than blue... God I known I wouldn't have ordered bc I already purchased a pair recently that were same color.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Dotson

customer_reviews.title: I am in love with this sunglasses!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely pretty. I love Ray Ban and the price was great
customer_reviews.author: Specialbeauty07

customer_reviews.title: That they will fit right
customer_reviews.text: My wife actually like this set go ladies glasses ,. Except that they did not fir right . We have returned them 3 weeks ago . We have not received the credit yet . Please apply my credit Tom
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not a "New" item
customer_reviews.text: Box had significant wear, Glasses were missing protective cover on the leg that prevents both legs from scratching each other. One of the legs was loose, it was clear to me this was not a New item, but rather something that might have been on some display having been handled countless times.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy Terrero

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: Not sure why Amazon is prompting me to write a shoe review since I purchased sunglasses. Interesting. Anyway, these glasses are just as expected. Classic aviator size and shape. Love the mirrored color lenses. Would love to purchase in another color if I can scrape together unnecessary-but-super-fun-glasses money. :)
customer_reviews.author: ENHD

customer_reviews.title: The metal is like a bronze or antique brass type of coloring
customer_reviews.text: Daughter loves the lense color and style. The purple is one color, no gradual fading. The metal is like a bronze or antique brass type of coloring. Cant picture these glasses on a man, definately has a more femanine look with the purple lense.
customer_reviews.author: GK5040Top Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Nice Aviators
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful glasses..my wife is very happy!!! And that's all that matters!!!
customer_reviews.author: jeff

customer_reviews.title: love the brown mirrored lens as it's not very common ...
customer_reviews.text: Authentic product. love the brown mirrored lens as it's not very common at all. Not very flashy, but subtle and keeps the eyes hidden. Brown leather case and cleaning cloth. Booklet on how to care for your Ray-Bans. I use these when it's partly sunny out and not very bright. Use my polarized ray-bans for sunnier days.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Love Loveeee these glasses
customer_reviews.text: Love Loveeee these glasses! They look pretty authentic - I compared them to the Ray Bans at a store - I didn't like that it came with a brown package, but I checked and Ray Ban does make brown cases - I've never seen them before. I use them a lot for more than a year now and they are still going strong. I haven't seen any damage on the metal, like when it turns rusty and old.
customer_reviews.author: Graciela Gabaldon de Araujo

customer_reviews.title: Fake!
customer_reviews.text: Fake!! Buyer Beware! I purchased another identical set from an authorized dealer; and did many test comparisons. Though the weight and look were almost identical; the writing on the inside of the frames was incorrect in comparison to the genuine Ray-Bans. If you don't necessarily care about it being "genuine," than these are a really good knockoff. I just wouldn't pay full price for them!
customer_reviews.author: Jean

customer_reviews.title: I REORDERED THE LARGER ONES TODAY THEY LOOKED GREAT BUT JUST TOO SMALL FOR MY FACE
customer_reviews.text: I RETURNED THE SUNGLASSES TODAY THEY WERE TOO SMALL THEY MUST HAVE BEEN CHILD GLASSES, I REORDERED THE LARGER ONES TODAY THEY LOOKED GREAT BUT JUST TOO SMALL FOR MY FACE. THANKS SHEILA
customer_reviews.author: John A. Borrelli

customer_reviews.title: ... "real" or original ray ban but they are the best copy I've seen
customer_reviews.text: I know they are not "real" or original ray ban but they are the best copy I've seen. Very comfortable and classic. I have little kids that mess around with my glasses. I can't afford the real one so that they get damaged. These work jus fine in the meantime.
customer_reviews.author: H.C.S

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Buy! Such a steal!
customer_reviews.text: It was yet another awesome buy from Amazon. I ordered my last pair of Ray-Bans on here as well and was very pleased with both purchases. These glasses are a great fit for any medium sized face. They are authentic Ray-Bans with an extremely beautiful color scheme. Great buy. I would recommend making sure that you are purchasing directly from Amazon. There is never any question about if the product is legit if they are bought directly through Amazon. Great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Sam Mesquita

customer_reviews.title: you get what you pay for!
customer_reviews.text: I normally don't review things but let me just say I am taking the time to review these because they are amazing. They fit awesome as soon as I put them on my face they felt completely awesome fit snugly no weight you can't even tell they're there. Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: DL

customer_reviews.title: nose piece
customer_reviews.text: the nose piece keeps slipping down my nose and after just a few minutes I can no longer breathe. I am going to take to a dealer to see if the glasses can be fixed or if I need to return for a smaller size.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila Ervin

customer_reviews.title: Blue aviators from Ray Ban. Sharp!
customer_reviews.text: Love my new blue aviators. Got them for 60 bucks below retail and Gaffos.com answered all my questions and were very helpful. They are a gorgeous blue mirrored glass. Very lightweight and the lenses make colors pop while providing a really clear visual of the outdoors. Highly recommend these if u are looking for a fun and cool set of aviators.
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: Great sunglasses!
customer_reviews.text: Overall: These are definitely authentic Raybans -- beautiful sunglasses that add sparkle and fun to any outfit. Love all of my flash lens aviators from RB... I now have the green, orange and yellow and I get lots of compliments on all of them. Eventually I will get the blue, too! I just love the quality and I know they will last me a lifetime. Sizing: As a female, I wear the 58mm and I have a small-medium shaped face.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Awesome sunglasses!!!
customer_reviews.text: These are the best sunglasses hands down. I also have a pair of the New Wayfarer & they too are Awesome sunglasses. You will not go wrong with Ray-Ban sunglasses. Side note: I originally got size 55mm & like everyone says they are way to small, so unless you are a kid or have a super small face I would recommend the 58mm in size because they are the perfect fit!!!
customer_reviews.author: Snarycristo

customer_reviews.title: Super cute ray-bans.
customer_reviews.text: These sunglasses came a few days after the projected delivery date in a box that was almost completely smashed, however, the glasses were in perfect condition and looked exactly as they were described. I was really happy with this purchase and would easily buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: Tony and Alisha

customer_reviews.title: Too big for the average head
customer_reviews.text: Way way way too big, they wouldn’t stay on my nose, ears and face. They are a bit heavy but the blue mirror affect was spot on. I sent them back immediately. Wish they would’ve fit!
customer_reviews.author: Kale

customer_reviews.title: Must get these
customer_reviews.text: I'm completely thrilled with these glasses! The lense is perfect to see through especially on a bright day, it's just the right amount of protection. Love the gold colored frame!!
customer_reviews.author: Rosebud

customer_reviews.title: Loving them
customer_reviews.text: I have only ever bought five dollar sunglasses my entire life but I'm really happy I decided to purchase these. They are lightweight but sturdy and look great. Plus the color is orangey pink which is like my dream combination. Overall very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Erica

customer_reviews.title: Love These Glasses!
customer_reviews.text: This is my third pair of Ray-Ban's and needless to say, I am quite pleased with this product. My one and ONLY "dislike" (very, very, minor) is that I had hoped the lenses would be more "mirrored". However, they fit perfectly, shield my eyes perfectly from the sun, and are extremely stylish. I would recommend these glasses.
customer_reviews.author: DB

customer_reviews.title: My trademark shades...
customer_reviews.text: Perfect iconic mirrored aviator. I love them. They're the perfect width for my round face with high cheekbones.
customer_reviews.author: MayaLa

customer_reviews.title: Somehow I thought the lens were orange. They appear ...
customer_reviews.text: Somehow I thought the lens were orange. They appear orange mirror from the front, but when you look through them while wearing them, they have a distinctive green tint. Consequently red appears burgundy or purple. Not that big a deal, but not what I was expecting. I prefer orange tinted shades because colors appear as they really are.
customer_reviews.author: B. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Great sunglasses
customer_reviews.text: The best and genuine rayban piece, great product, looks great and very conffortable for the eyes. Excelent choice and excelent seller!
customer_reviews.author: Orlando P.

customer_reviews.title: Great Glasses shipped via pack mule
customer_reviews.text: My glasses arrived today and as soon as the sun comes back out, I will be wearing them. They were just what I wanted and were packed very well but they took TWENTY days to get from NJ to GA via USPS. USPS tracking showed up through yesterday that they had an estimated delivery of 12 days ago with no updated information.
customer_reviews.author: ST

customer_reviews.title: They come in the traditional brown case not the greatest I would prefer a hard case but oh well
customer_reviews.text: Love them! My first pair and I love them. They come in the traditional brown case not the greatest I would prefer a hard case but oh well. They do get finger prints like crazy but come with a cleaning cloth so that's helpful!
customer_reviews.author: MrsQ

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Good quality but from my.observations I don't believe these are real raybans. Although there are close enough and at least they come in a nice case and a lense cloth.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Mosquera

customer_reviews.title: Ray Bans make an UNFORGETTABLE gift!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my husband as an Anniversary gift, and they were amazing! He loves the fit, and the look, and they made quite the memorable gift!
customer_reviews.author: Christi Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Love them! From a female buyer
customer_reviews.text: They say large but I don’t think they are any bigger than the others I own. Love them! From a female buyer.
customer_reviews.author: SK0001

customer_reviews.title: they look good.
customer_reviews.text: overall comfort is average for these they are a tight on my face but they look good. after wearing these for a few weeks they have conformed to my face. Lenses are top notch for ray ban so no complaints there only rant is they are a little on the heavy side. overall good pair of shades for a decent price.
customer_reviews.author: beastmode

product_meta.title: Ray-Ban Rb3025 Aviator Classic Mirrored Sunglasses
product_meta.description:
Originally designed for U.S. aviators in 1937, Ray-Ban RB3025 Aviator sunglasses have quickly become one of the most iconic sunglasses models in the world. These perfect Ray-Ban Aviators for women and men are a timeless model that combines great aviator styling with exceptional quality, performance, and comfort. These updated Ray-Ban sunglasses feature high-quality crystal flash mirrored lenses, which provide superior 100% UV protection and enhance vision in multiple light conditions. Aviator sunglasses by Ray-Ban are comfortable unisex glasses that are offered in multiple frame- and lens-color options. 

Made famous by the 1980s movie Top Gun and others, these Ray-Ban sunglasses for women and men are known for elegant wire frames that are durable and built to last. With a classic metal frame, you can see the world through a variety of lens colors including blue, green, gradient, and more—all of which provide optimal visual clarity and 100% UV protection. The mirrored lenses absorb 85% of visible light and block out most blue light. They provide amazing color contrast and produce better clarity and more natural vision. These sunglasses for women and men are comfortable to wear and make a statement anywhere you wear them. To keep them clean, we’ve included a lens cloth in the case.

Ray-Ban is the world’s most iconic eyewear brand and is a global leader in its sector. Every model in the Ray-Ban collection is the product of meticulous, original styling that translates the best of the latest fashion trends into an ever-contemporary look for millions of Ray-Ban wearers around the world. From the early Aviator style that emerged in 1937 to the introduction of the classic Wayfarer in 1952, Ray-Ban is a brand that embodies America, adventure, great cities, wide-open spaces, heroism, individuality, and authenticity.
feature_bullets: CLASSIC AVIATOR SUNGLASSES: Protect your eyes with style made famous by aviators since 1937. Ray-Ban RB3025 Large Metal Aviator Sunglasses are superior unisex glasses with multiple frame and lens options.
FLASH MIRRORED SUNGLASSES: RB3025 Aviator Large Metal sunglasses feature mirrored lenses which provide superior protection against UV light.
100% UV PROTECTION: These aviator sunglasses were made famous by Top Gun. You can feel comfortable knowing that the Ray-Ban lenses will provide 100% UV protection.
UNISEX SUNGLASSES: Whether you’re looking for Ray-Ban sunglasses for women or men, RB3025 Aviators are designed as unisex sunglasses that are durable and fashionable.

MULTIPLE FRAME AND LENS COLORS: With a variety of metal frame colors to choose from, including gold, silver or black, see the world through a variety of flash mirrored lens colors including blue, green, violet, gradient, and more.

MULTIPLE SIZE OPTIONS: Choose from a variety of size options including 55mm, 58mm and 62mm. 55mm is recommended for smaller or more narrow faces, while the bigger 62mm is recommended for those with large heads or wide faces. The 58mm the best fit for men with an average width face, and fits the average women's face for a slightly oversized look.
CASE & LENS CLOTH INCLUDED: Each pair of Ray-Ban sunglasses come with a case and lens cloth to clean and protect them from scratches and damage.
VISIT THE RAY-BAN BRAND SHOP: Click on the Ray-Ban logo above to view the entire Ray-Ban brand assortment.
